Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.description: Hurl a fiery projectile at your target, causing a burst of flames and burning damage upon impact.

Supernova.name: Supernova
Supernova.description: Unleash a massive explosion of fire, dealing heavy damage to all nearby enemies.

Flamestrike.name: Flamestrike
Flamestrike.description: Call down a pillar of fire, dealing massive damage to all enemies in the area.

Gravity Well.name: Gravity Well
Gravity Well.description: Manipulate gravitational forces to create a localized mini-singularity, pulling enemies toward its center and immobilizing them.

Gravity Crush.name: Gravity Crush
Gravity Crush.description: Crush your enemies with the force of gravity, dealing massive damage and breaking their armor.

Atomic Burst.name: Atomic Burst
Atomic Burst.description: Unleash a sudden burst of atomic energy, causing a localized explosion that damages all enemies within its radius.

Frost Nova.name: Frost Nova
Frost Nova.description: Freeze the area around you in a chilling explosion, immobilizing and damaging nearby enemies.

Ice Lance.name: Ice Lance
Ice Lance.description: Launch a shard of ice at your target, dealing moderate frost damage.

Avalanche.name: Avalanche
Avalanche.description: Summon a massive avalanche to crush and bury your enemies, dealing substantial cold damage in an area.

Magic Missile.name: Magic Missile
Magic Missile.description: Unleash a homing projectile that never misses its target, dealing moderate arcane damage.

Heal.name: Heal
Heal.description: Heal yourself or an ally for a moderate amount.
